summary: Returning from the planet Venus, an errant NASA spacecraft crashes into the ocean, spilling its radioactive cargo. Enveloped by a radioactive mass, a rabid weasel is transformed into a ... See full summary »
cast: John Smihula|Fred Borges|Fred Dabby|Jody Kadish|Steven Kriete|Edward Schiff|Jon Grossman|Marie Louise Lomba|Karen Khazzam|Carol Cancro|Tina Hawn|Linda Herrmann
title: Weasels Rip My Flesh
